text: [1298 AN, 19 years later][Static Castle, The Territories of Bipole]
???: *knock* *knock* *knock*
???: Who is it?
???: Greeetings, Quest.
Proton: I am Proton Xurr of the Knights of Static.
Quest: Ah, the Nolavillian Knight.
Proton: Xuir, actually.
Quest: My apologies.
Quest: Anyway, why are you here?
Proton: There is a large band of bandits, known as theGuild of Retool, who have threatened the allied territoryof Sine with an attack.
Proton: The King has request us, as well as the head of theknights, Sir Scien, to assist Sine against the forces.
Quest: I would decline, but I suppose this is an orderfrom the King.
Quest: *sigh*
Quest: I'll meet you at the front gates in an hour,is that alright?
Proton: Yes, we will await you there.
[1 hour later...]
Proton: So you finally arrive...
Proton: Shall we get going?
Quest: Actually, there's this knight who hasoffered to aid us...
???: Hello, I'm Romra!
Romra: I'm a newly certified knight, and I wishto one day join the Static Elemental OffenseSquad.
Romra: Of course, I'll need all of the trainingI can get to do so.
Romra: If you would allow it, I would like topartake in this mission along side you.
[Recruit Romra?](Q) Recruit(W) Do not recruit
Romra: Oh, sorry for bothering you.
Scien: Let's get going.
